login-require: You need to login to use this feature
login-success-prompt: You have been logged in successfully.
server-error-prompt: There was an error logging you in. Please try again.
request-failed: Request failed. Please check your network and try again.
request-success: Your operation has been successfully executed.
pricing: See model pricing for more details
fatal-tips: Please try to check your network, browser compatibility, try to clear the browser cache and refresh the page. If the problem still exists, please provide the log to the developer so that we can troubleshoot the problem.

conversation.title: Conversation
conversation.refresh-failed-prompt: There was an error during your request. Please try again.
conversation.remove-description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the conversation
conversation.remove-all-description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete all conversations, continue?
conversation.delete-failed-prompt: Failed to delete conversation. Please check your network and try again.

chat.recall-desc: Detected that you have unsent messages last time, has been restored for you.

buy.dialog-desc: Are you sure you want to buy {{amount}} points?
buy.failed-prompt: Failed to purchase points, please make sure you have enough balance.
buy.gpt4-tip: Tip: web searching feature may consume more input points

pkg.title: Packages
pkg.cert-desc: After real-name certification, you can get 50 points (worth 5 CNY)
pkg.teen-desc: After real-name certification, teenagers (18 years old and under) can get an additional 150 points (worth 15 CNY)

sub.title: Subscription
sub.plan-gpt4-desc: including GPT 4 Turbo, GPT 4V, GPT 4 DALLE
sub.migrate-plan-desc: After changing the subscription, your subscription time will be calculated based on the remaining days price, and the subscription time will be recalculated. (For example, downgrading will double the time, and upgrading will make up the difference)
sub.success-prompt: You have successfully subscribed to {{month}} months subscription.
sub.failed-prompt: Failed to subscribe, please make sure you have enough balance.

file.type: Support pdf, docx, pptx, xlsx, image, text and other formats
file.drop: Drag and drop files here or click to upload
file.max-length-prompt: The content has been truncated due to the context length limit
file.over-size-prompt: The size of a single attachment cannot exceed {{size}} MB
file.large-file-prompt: Uploading and parsing large files, please wait patiently
file.empty-file-prompt: File content is empty, has been automatically ignored

generate.title: AI Project Generator
generate.success-prompt: Project generated successfully! Please select the download format.

api.title: API Settings

service.description: A new version is available. Do you want to update now?
service.update-success-prompt: You have been updated to the latest version.

share.title: Share
share.copied-description: Link has been copied to clipboard
share.not-found-description: Conversation not found, please check if the link is correct or the conversation has been deleted

invitation.title: Redeem Code
invitation.check-success-description: Redeem Success! You have received {{amount}} points, start your AI journey!

article.title: Batch Generate Articles
article.input-placeholder: Please enter the article title (one line each)
article.prompt-placeholder: Please enter the preset (help AI generate articles, such as: academic paper format, 800 words)
article.web-checkbox: Whether to enable web search function
article.generate-success-prompt: Article generated successfully! Please select the download format.
article.generate-failed-prompt: Failed to generate article, please check your network and try again.

admin.quota-action-desc: Please enter the quota change value (positive for increase, negative for decrease)
admin.subscription-action-desc: Please enter the gift subscription months
admin.operate-success-prompt: Your operation has been successfully executed.

channels.name: Name
channels.name-tip: Channel name, used to identify the channel
channels.priority-tip: When there are multiple channels, the request is made according to the priority order, the higher the priority, the higher the priority
channels.weight-tip: When the priority is the same, the load balancing call is performed according to the weight ratio
channels.retry-tip: When the channel request fails, the maximum number of retries
channels.secret-placeholder:
Please enter the secret, format: {{format}}
When there are multiple secrets, one line is selected randomly when requesting the load
channels.mapper-tip: Model name conversion to achieve asymmetric model request
channels.mapper-placeholder:
Please enter the model mapper, one line each, format: model>model
The former is the requested model, and the latter is the mapped model (which needs to exist in the model), separated by > in the middle
The format is preceded by! Indicates that the original model is not included in the available range of this channel, such as: !gpt-4-slow>gpt-4, then gpt-4 will not be covered in the available models that can be requested in this channel
channels.group-tip: User group, the group that is not included will not be included in the available range of this channel (when the group is empty, all users can use this channel)
channels.add-custom-model: Add Custom Model (Multiple models are separated by spaces)

system.backendTip: Backend callback domain (docker installation default path is /api), receive callback parameters.
system.searchTip:
DuckDuckGo search endpoint, if not filled in, use WebPilot and New Bing reverse search function by default.
DuckDuckGo API project build: [duckduckgo-api](https://github.com/binjie09/duckduckgo-api).

auth.username-or-email-placeholder: Please enter your username or mailbox
auth.reset-success-prompt: Your password has been reset, please log in with your new password.
auth.send-code-success-prompt: The verification code has been sent to your email, please check it.
auth.send-code-failed-prompt: Failed to send verification code, reason: {{reason}}
